description: Your Solar weapons gain a small bonus to damage while you have any Armor Charge. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.

name: Stasis Weapon Surge
description: Your Stasis weapons gain a small bonus to damage while you have any Armor Charge. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.

name: Strand Weapon Surge
description: Your Strand weapons gain a small bonus to damage while you have any Armor Charge. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.

name: Void Weapon Surge
description: Your Void weapons gain a small bonus to damage while you have any Armor Charge. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.

name: Font of Agility
description: You gain a bonus to mobility while you have any Armor Charge. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.

name: Kinetic Holster
description: Gradually reloads your stowed Kinetic weapons over time.

name: Arc Holster
description: Gradually reloads your stowed Arc weapons over time.

name: Solar Holster
description: Gradually reloads your stowed Solar weapons over time.

name: Stasis Holster
description: Gradually reloads your stowed Stasis weapons over time.

name: Strand Holster
description: Gradually reloads your stowed Strand weapons over time.

name: Void Holster
description: Gradually reloads your stowed Void weapons over time.

name: Harmonic Scavenger
description: Arc weapons get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that weapon.

name: Kinetic Scavenger
description: Kinetic weapons get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that weapon.

name: Arc Scavenger
description: Arc weapons get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that weapon.

name: Solar Scavenger
description: Solar weapons get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that weapon.

name: Stasis Scavenger
description: Stasis weapons get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that weapon.

name: Strand Scavenger
description: Strand weapons get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that weapon.

name: Void Scavenger
description: Void weapons get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that weapon.

name: Elemental Charge
description: Collecting a Firesprite, Ionic Trace, Stasis shard, or Void Breach, or destroying a Strand Tangle has an escalating chance to give you Armor Charge.

name: Resilience-Forged
description: +3 Resilience ▲

name: Recovery-Forged
description: +3 Recovery ▲

name: Mobility-Forged
description: +3 Mobility ▲

name: Discipline-Forged
description: +3 Discipline ▲

name: Intellect-Forged
description: +3 Intellect ▲

name: Strength-Forged
description: +3 Strength ▲

name: Traveler's Fervor
description: Sliding after sprinting for a short time sends forth a burning line of fire, dealing damage and scorching targets in its path.

name: Traveler's Transference
description: Sprinting for a short time causes you to become amplified. While you are amplified, melee damage creates lightning bolts which damage nearby combatants.

name: Traveler's Diffraction
description: Defeating combatants with Void damage has a chance to create Void seekers that track nearby targets and suppress them.

name: Traveler's Sublimation
description: Rapidly defeating combatants with Stasis weapons creates a Stasis mine that damages and freezes nearby combatants.

name: Traveler's Proliferation
description: Defeating combatants with any source of Strand damage produces Threadlings. Defeating powerful combatants produces more Threadlings.

name: Traveler's Multiplicity
description: Finisher final blows convert your next thrown grenade into a bonus fragmentation grenade.

name: Traveler's Abundance
description: Defeating combatants with your grenade has a chance to spawn Special ammo. Defeating combatants with your Super ability has a chance to spawn Heavy ammo.

name: Traveler's Animus
description: Defeating a combatant has a chance to create a random elemental pickup or Orb of Power.

name: Traveler's Insight
description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased Super ability regeneration.

name: Traveler's Facet
description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased class ability regeneration.

name: Traveler's Aegis
description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides a regenerating overshield.

name: Traveler's Remedy
description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased health regeneration.

name: Traveler's Resurgence
description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased grenade ability regeneration.

name: Traveler's Valor
description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased melee ability regeneration.

name: Traveler's Grace
description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that randomly provides the effects of one of the other Pale Blessing mods.

name: Higher Purpose
description: Significant damage resistance while airborne.

name: Vampiric Touch
description: Precision kills trigger health regeneration.

name: Energetic Assassin
description: Precision kills grant grenade and melee energy.

name: Anti-Barrier Auto Rifle
description: Your equipped Auto Rifles fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. Additionally, Auto Rifles are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

name: Unstoppable Hand Cannon
description: Aiming down the sights of a Hand Cannon for a short time loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Hand Cannons are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

name: Overload Scout Rifle
description: Landing consecutive hits on combatants with any Scout Rifle you are wielding causes disruption, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering their damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Additionally, Scout Rifles are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

name: Overload Trace Rifles
description: Uninterrupted fire from your equipped Trace Rifles causes the beam to stun combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering their damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Additionally, Trace Rifles are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

name: Unstoppable Glaive
description: Glaives you wield fire a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Glaives are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

name: Authorized Mods: Arc
description: The armor energy costs of all armor mods affecting your Arc weapons are significantly discounted.

name: Authorized Mods: Void
description: The armor energy costs of all armor mods affecting your Void weapons are significantly discounted.

name: Authorized Mods: Strand
description: The armor energy costs of all armor mods affecting your Strand weapons are significantly discounted.

name: Authorized Mods: Melee
description: The armor energy costs of all armor mods affecting your melee are significantly discounted.

name: Technicolor Siphon
description: Grants access to Helmet armor mods that combine the effects of the Strand Siphon and Arc Siphon mods.

name: Improved Unraveling
description: Increases the amount of damage dealt by unraveling a target.

name: Deeper Origins
description: Greatly improves the benefits provided by the Unsated Hunger, Nanotech Tracer Rockets, Harmonic Resonance, and Noble Deeds traits.

name: Unto the Breach
description: Defeating a Void debuffed target creates a Void Breach while your Void subclass is equipped.

name: Amped Up
description: Stay amplified longer while your Arc subclass is equipped.

name: Thunderous Retort
description: Grants bonus Arc Super damage if cast while critically wounded or while amplified. Lasts until the end of the Super activation.

name: Strand Soldier
description: Your Strand weapons gain Unraveling Rounds whenever you gain Woven Mail while your Strand subclass is equipped.

name: Overcharged Armory
description: Weapons with the Unsated Hunger, Nanotech Tracer Rockets, Harmonic Resonance, and Noble Deeds traits are always overcharged weapons for you when that modifier is active.

name: Protective Breach
description: Picking up a Void Breach gives you an overshield or refreshes your existing overshield.

name: Counter Charge
description: Gain a stack of Armor Charge when you stun a Champion.

name: Electric Armor
description: Gain damage resistance while amplified.

name: Conductive Cosmic Needle
description: Targets affected by Strand debuffs take increased damage from Arc and Void abilities.

name: Shock and Awe
description: Arc final blows while you are amplified summon a burst of lightning that damages and jolts targets.

name: Supernova
description: Picking up a Void Breach causes your next source of Void damage to create a large weakening pulse.

name: Squad Goals
description:
Performing a finisher while you are amplified grants Amplified to nearby allies when your Arc subclass is equipped. 

Performing a finisher while you have Woven Mail grants Woven Mail to nearby allies when your Strand subclass is equipped. 

Performing a finisher while you have Devour grants Devour to nearby allies when your Void subclass is equipped.

name: Lightning Strikes Twice
description: After throwing an Arc grenade, gain increased grenade recharge for a short time. Arc final blows extend the duration of this benefit.

name: Anti-Barrier Auto Rifle
description: Your equipped Auto Rifles fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. Additionally, Auto Rifles are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

name: Piercing Bowstring
description:
Bows gain shield-piercing arrows, which bypass combatant defenses.

Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. Additionally, Bows are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Unstoppable Scout Rifle
description: Aiming down the sights of a Scout Rifle for a short time loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Scout Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Overload Hand Cannon
description:
Landing consecutive hits with any Hand Cannon you are wielding disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

name: Unstoppable Fusion
description:
Aiming down sights for a brief period with any Fusion Rifle you are wielding loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Fusion Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Arc/Strand Siphon Combo
description: Combines the Arc and Strand Siphon mods into one.

name: Solar/Strand Siphon Combo
description: Combines the Solar and Strand Siphon mods into one.

name: Void/Strand Siphon Combo
description: Combines the Void and Strand Siphon mods into one.

name: Origin Perk Specialization I
description: Greatly improves the benefits provided by the Head Rush, Nanotech Tracer Rockets, Unsated Hunger, and Cursed Thrall Origin Traits.

name: Diviner's Discount
description: All Scavenger mods are discounted.

name: Thanatotic Tangles
description: Strand weapon final blows have a chance to generate a Tangle.

name: Origin Perk Specialization II
description: Weapons with the Head Rush, Nanotech Tracer Rockets, Unsated Hunger, and Cursed Thrall Origin Traits are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Elemental Orbs: Void
description: While using a Void subclass, Void weapon final blows have a chance to spawn a Void Elemental Orb. Void Orbs can be thrown to create a Void explosion that makes enemies it damages volatile.

name: Elemental Orbs: Arc
description: While using an Arc subclass, Arc weapon final blows have a chance to spawn an Arc Elemental Orb. Arc Orbs can be thrown to create an Arc explosion that jolts targets it damages.

name: Elemental Orbs: Solar
description: While using a Solar subclass, Solar weapon final blows have a chance to spawn a Solar Elemental Orb. Solar Orbs can be thrown to create a Solar explosion that scorches targets it damages.

name: Overload Machine Guns
description:
Uninterrupted fire from your equipped Machine Guns grants bullets that stun combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

name: Elemental Fury
description: While stunned, Champions take bonus damage from your abilities and Elemental Orb damage.

name: Communal Pickups
description: When an ally destroys or picks up your Tangle or Elemental Orb, the Tangle cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds and you gain bonus damage with weapons matching your subclass for 10 seconds.

name: Refreshing Pickups
description: Picking up a Tangle or Elemental Orb grants energy to your least-powered ability.

name: Monochromatic Maestro
description: Dealing elemental ability damage increases matching weapon damage, and elemental weapon damage increases matching ability damage. Bonus granted is 10% for 5 seconds.

name: Rapid-Fire Ranger
description: Rapid precision hits against distant combatants weaken them for a short duration.

name: Elemental Embrace
description: Subclass elemental buffs grant you bonus recovery and damage resistance against combatant attacks of the matching element type.

name: Elemental Munitions
description: Combatant final blows with Tangles or Elemental Orbs have a chance to drop Special or Heavy ammo.

name: Frenzied Stacks
description: Your Armor Charges grant bonus damage to your thrown Tangles or Elemental Orbs. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.

name: Piercing Sidearms
description: Your equipped Sidearms fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. Additionally, Sidearms are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Unstoppable Hand Cannon
description: Aiming down the sights of a Hand Cannon for a short time loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Hand Cannons are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

name: Unstoppable Bow
description: Holding a Bow fully drawn for a short time loads powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Bows are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Overload Auto Rifle
description: Sustained fire from Auto Rifles disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Additionally, Auto Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Overload Pulse Rifle
description: Sustained fire from Pulse Rifles disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Additionally, Pulse Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Flame, Fiber, and Freeze
description: Combines the Solar/Strand and Solar/Stasis Siphon mods into one.

name: Kindling Trigger
description: Radiant causes Solar weapons to apply scorch to unscorched combatants.

name: Blast Radius
description: Rapid final blows with Rocket Launchers and Grenade Launchers grant Armor Charge.

name: Origin Perk Specialization I
description:
Improves the benefits provided by the Sundering, Nano-Munitions, and Nanotech Tracer Rockets Origin Traits.

Additionally, weapons with these traits are always overcharged.

name: From Whence You Came
description: Increases ability damage to Taken and Scorn combatants.

name: Flint Striker
description: Rapid Solar weapon precision hits and rapid Solar weapon final blows grant Radiant.

name: Torch
description: While radiant, deal increased weapon damage to combatants affected by Strand and Stasis debuffs.

name: Heart of the Flame
description: Casting your Solar Super grants nearby allies radiant and increases the damage of your Super for each nearby ally.

name: Origin Perk Specialization II
description:
Improves the benefits provided by the Noble Deeds, Unsated Hunger, Head Rush, and Dragon's Vengeance Origin Traits.

Additionally, weapons with these traits are always overcharged.

name: Wished into Being
description:
While your Super is nearly fully-charged, ability final blows spawn Orbs of Power.  

Wearing Season of the Wish armor decreases Super amount threshold.

name: Unravelling Orbs
description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants Strand weapons Unraveling Rounds.

name: Pillar of Ice
description: Defeating a frozen target spawns Stasis crystals.

name: Revitalizing Blast
description: Causing damage with a Solar ability weakens Champions and bosses for a short duration.

name: Overload Rocket Launchers
description: Rocket Launchers are especially affective against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

name: Dragon's Bite
description:
Breaking a combatant's shield with a Strand or Stasis weapon has a chance to suspend or freeze that combatant. 

Wearing Season of the Wish armor increases this chance.

name: Horde Shuttle
description: Damaging unraveled targets with a weapon occasionally spawns a threadling.

name: Hail The Storm
description:
Shattering frozen targets and Stasis crystals deals increased damage.

Shattering Stasis crystals releases shards of ice that damage and slow targets.

name: Rays of Precision
description: While radiant, Solar precision final blows cause combatants to ignite.

name: Solo Operative
description: While you are the only member of your fireteam, you deal increased damage to all combatants.

name: Argent Ordnance
description: Firing a Rocket Launcher consumes one stack of Armor Charge, granting increased damage and reload speed until you reload or stow your Rocket Launcher.

name: Anti-Barrier Pulse Rifle
description: Your equipped Pulse Rifles fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. Additionally, Pulse Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Unstoppable Sidearm
description:
Aiming down the sights of a Sidearm for a short time loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

Additionally, Sidearms are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

name: Unstoppable Scout Rifle
description: Aiming down the sights of a Scout Rifle for a short time loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Scout Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Overload Hand Cannon
description:
Landing consecutive hits with any Hand Cannon you are wielding disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. 

Additionally, Hand Cannons are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

name: Anti-barrier Submachine Gun
description:
Submachine Guns you are wielding fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

Additionally, Submachine Guns are always overcharged when the modifier is active.

name: Anti-Barrier Sniper Rifle
description:
Sniper Rifles you are wielding fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

Additionally, Sniper Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Overload Auto Rifle
description:
Uninterrupted fire from your equipped Auto Rifles grants bullets that stun combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

Additionally, Auto Rifles are always overcharged when this modifier is active.

name: Logic Reductor
description: Weapons with the Radiolaria Transposer origin perk deal increased damage to Vex. Extends the duration of the radiolaria pools created by Radiolaria Transposer.

name: Overcharged Armory
description: Weapons with the Dealer's Choice, Radiolaria Transposer, Collective Purpose, and Sundering Origin traits are always Overcharged weapons for you when that modifier is active.

name: Authorized Mod: Elemental Charge
description: The energy cost of Elemental Charge mods are significantly discounted.

name: Saint's Inspiration
description: Rounds loaded by the Cast No Shadows origin perk can overflow the magazine.

name: Winning Hand
description:
While using weapons with the Dealer's Choice origin trait, combatant precision final blows or rapidly defeating combatants cause the target to explode, dealing Solar damage to nearby combatants.

Having several equipped weapons with the Dealer's Choice origin trait increases the effect of the explosion.

name: Authorized Mods: Scavenger
description: The energy cost of Scavenger mods are significantly discounted.

name: Authorized Mod: Charged Up
description: The energy cost of the Charged Up mod is significantly discounted.

name: Elemental Siphon
description: Rapid final blows with a Kinetic weapon or a weapon matching your equipped Super create an elemental pickup that matches your equipped Super.

name: Overload Sword
description:
Landing consecutive hits with a Sword you are wielding disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. 

Additionally, Swords are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Creeping Chill
description: Stasis weapon final blows against slowed or frozen targets release a burst that slows.

name: Press The Advantage
description: Breaking a combatant's shield grants increased weapon stability, handling, and reload speed. Swords gain increased guard resistance.

name: Threaded Blast
description: Destroying a Tangle with a Strand weapon creates a larger and more damaging explosion.

name: Incendiary Rifle Rounds
description: Solar Sniper Rifle precision hits scorch targets.

name: Sustained Fire
description: Continuously damaging combatants with an Auto Rifle grants you damage resistance.

name: Counter Energy
description: When you or a member of your fireteam stuns a champion, you gain energy for your least-charged ability.

name: Blade Stamina
description: Rapidly defeating combatants with a Sword refunds some ammo.

name: Void Hegemony
description: While you have a Void or Prismatic subclass equipped, defeating weakened targets provides a small Void Overshield.

name: Radiant Orbs
description: While you have a Solar or Prismatic subclass equipped, picking up an Orb of Power makes you radiant.

name: Galvanic Armor
description: While you have an Arc or Prismatic subclass equipped, incoming damage from combatants is reduced while amplified.

name: Solar Fulmination
description: Your ignitions do increased damage in an increased radius.

name: Targeting Autoloader
description:
While you have an Auto Rifle equipped, defeating combatants reloads your equipped weapon and temporarily increases weapon damage. 

Awards bonus progress when dealing final blows while surrounded.

name: Prismatic Transfer
description: When you cast your Super, each member of your fireteam with a Super type different than yours gains a bonus to weapon damage.

name: Argent Blade
description: While you have Armor Charge, dealing damage with a Sword consumes an Armor Charge and empowers your Sword for a short time, granting it bonus damage and energy charge rate.

name: Expanding Abyss
description: Void sources deal increased damage to weakened targets.

name: Shieldcrush
description:
While you have Woven Mail, Frost Armor, or a Void Overshield, your melee recharges faster and deals increased damage.

While you are amplified or radiant, your grenade recharges faster and deals increased damage.

name: Transference
description:
Gain increased grenade and melee damage while transcendent.

Weapon final blows while transcendent refund Light and Dark energy after Transcendence ends.

name: Sniper's Meditation
description: Sniper Rifle hits grant stacking Sniper Rifle damage, stability, and reload bonuses for a short time. Heavy ammo Sniper Rifle hits count as more than one.

name: Shock and Awe
description: When you have an Arc or Prismatic subclass equipped, Arc final blows while you are amplified summon a burst of lightning that damages and jolts targets.

name: Diluted Tonic of Protecting Frost
description:
WIND CHILL
BOOST: Dealing [Stasis]Stasis damage to slowed targets has the chance to spawn a Stasis Shard.

name: Diluted Tonic of Stasis Crystallization
description:
CRYSTALLINE CONVERTER
BOOST: [Stasis]Stasis weapon final blows after activating your class ability spawn a Stasis Shard.

name: Diluted Tonic of Renewing Finishers
description:
DEBILITATING WAVE
BOOST: While you have an [Arc]Arc, [Void]Void, or [Stasis]Stasis Super equipped, the blast also applies Blind, Weaken, and Slow, respectively.

name: Diluted Tonic of Weakening Void
description:
POWER FROM PAIN
BOOST: Rapidly defeating weakened combatants spawns a Void breach.

name: Diluted Tonic of Amplified Arc
description:
TRACE EVIDENCE
BOOST: Picking up an Ionic Trace grants an Armor Charge.

name: Diluted Tonic of Brawling
description:
THE THICK OF IT
BOOST: While you are surrounded, your weapons have increased handling. Swords gain increased charge rate.

name: Diluted Tonic of Void Shrapnel
description:
VOID RENEWAL
BOOST: Picking up a Void Breach reloads Shotguns and Grenade Launchers.

name: Potent Tonic of Protecting Frost
description:
ARMOR OF ERAMIS
BOOST: Increase the radius and strength of this freezing burst.

name: Potent Tonic of Stasis Crystallization
description:
HAIL THE STORM
BOOST: Shattering frozen targets and Stasis crystals deals increased damage.

name: Potent Tonic of Renewing Finishers
description:
CONDUCTIVE COSMIC CRYSTAL
BOOST: Increases damage to combatants that are affected by a [Stasis]Stasis debuff.

name: Potent Tonic of Weakening Void
description:
CONCUSSIVE RELOAD
BOOST: Using Grenade Launchers to damage bosses, Champions, or to break combatants' shields automatically reloads stowed weapons.

name: Potent Tonic of Amplified Arc
description:
RETINAL BURN
BOOST: Blinding a target this way instead emits a blinding burst.

name: Potent Tonic of Brawling
description:
CURATIVE ORBS
BOOST: Picking up an Orb of Power or elemental pickup grants you a small amount of health.

name: Potent Tonic of Void Shrapnel
description:
OLD GOD'S RITE
BOOST: Create more seeking projectiles on final blow.

BOOST: Dealing [Stasis]Stasis damage to slowed targets has the chance to spawn a Stasis Shard.

name: Anti-Barrier Scout Rifle
description: Scout Rifles you are wielding fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. Additionally, Scout Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Overload Submachine Gun
description: Landing consecutive hits with any Submachine Gun you are wielding disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Additionally, Submachine Guns are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Unstoppable Pulse Rifle
description: Aiming down the sights of a Pulse Rifle for a short time loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Pulse Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Anti-Barrier Shotgun
description: Shotguns you are wielding fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. Additionally, Shotguns are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Overload Breechloaded Grenade Launcher
description: Damaging a combatant with Primary or Special ammo Grenade Launchers disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Additionally, Primary and Special ammo Grenade Launchers are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: One with Frost
description: While Frost Armor is active, [Stasis] Stasis weapons gain increased reload speed and stability. Stasis Swords gain increased guard resistance.

name: Killing Breeze
description:
Rapid weapon final blows grant you a bonus to mobility.

Weapon final blows with the Dark Ether Reaper origin trait count as more than one.

name: Enhanced Ether Generator
description:
Dark Ether Reaper origin trait has a chance to spawn an extra Dark Ether charge.

Weapons with the Dark Ether Reaper origin trait are overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Fell the Revenant
description:
Deal increased weapon damage to Scorn. 

Wearing Shadestalker Armor (currently {var:1903370001} of 4) increases the bonus damage.

name: Rapid Impacts
description: Dealing damage with a Grenade Launcher temporarily increases the reload speed of Grenade Launchers.

name: Wind Chill
description:
Rapid [Stasis] Stasis weapon precision hits grant you a stack of Frost Armor.

Rapid precision hits from weapons with the Dark Ether Reaper origin trait grant you more stacks of Frost Armor.

name: Crystalline Converter
description: Gather [Stasis] Stasis Shards to gain stacks of Crystalline Converter. Your next powered [Stasis] Stasis melee hit creates Stasis crystals equal to the number of stacks you have.

name: Total Carnage
description:
After finishing a powerful combatant, gain temporary damage resistance.

While you have 2 or more Shadestalker armor pieces equipped (currently {var:1903370001} of 4), after finishing a powerful combatant, gain increased temporary damage resistance and replenish health.

name: Power from Pain
description: Rapid final blows against weakened combatants grants you Devour.

name: Trace Evidence
description: Rapid precision hits or rapid final blows on targets affected by Jolt or Blind will generate Ionic Traces.

name: Armor of Eramis
description: While Frost Armor is active, taking critical damage from combatants causes you to emit a freezing burst.

name: Hail The Storm
description: Shattering [Stasis] Stasis crystals releases shards of ice that damage and slow targets.

name: Debilitating Wave
description: Finishers emit a damaging wave that matches the element of your currently equipped Super.

name: Concussive Reload
description: Using a Grenade Launcher to damage a boss, damage a Champion, or break a combatant's shield weakens them.

name: Retinal Burn
description: Rapid [Arc] Arc weapon precision hits consume an Armor Charge to blind the target.

name: Brain Freeze
description:
Frozen combatants become surrounded by chilling fog, which slows combatants that aren't already.

Weapons with the Dark Ether Reaper origin trait deal more damage to frozen combatants.

name: Supernova
description: Picking up a Void Breach causes your next source of Void damage to create a large weakening pulse.

name: Conductive Cosmic Crystal
description: Your [Arc] Arc abilities, [Void] Void abilities, and weapons with the Dark Ether Reaper origin trait do bonus damage to targets that are affected by a [Stasis] Stasis debuff.

name: Served Cold
description:
Picking up a [Stasis] Stasis Shard grants you class ability energy. 

Picking up a [Void] Void Breach grants you melee energy.

name: Kinetic Impacts
description:
Sustained damage with a Power Grenade Launcher causes the combatant to emit a shockwave that damages nearby combatants.

This shockwave can stun [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

name: Synapse Junctions
description: Chained Arc Staff hits buff damage and duration.

name: Probability Matrix
description: Improves Arcbolt Grenades.

name: Wraithmetal Mail
description: Dodge reloads guns and buffs speed and handling.

name: Upgraded Sensor Pack
description: Provides radar while you're aiming and marks targets, increasing damage to low-health marked targets.

name: Hawkeye Hack
description: Golden Gun fires one high-damage shot.

name: Relentless Tracker
description: Improves weapon damage after damaging a target with an ability.

name: Illegally Modded Holster
description: Hand Cannons ready faster and gain increased accuracy and bonus damage.

name: Uncanny Arrows
description: Grants Deadfall and Moebius Quiver energy.

name: Hydraulic Boosters
description: Buffs sprint, slide, and jumping.

name: Fury Conductors
description: Melee hits grant Armor Charge and store explosive Arc energy.

name: Horns of Doom
description: Defeating targets with Void damage grants a bonus to Void weapons, and defeating targets with Void melee grants Super energy. Improves Sentinel Shield.

name: Biotic Enhancements
description: Being surrounded buffs damage and weapon handling.

name: Survival Well
description: More Orbs from Supers. Casting Barricade heals.

name: Auto-Loading Link
description: Steadily reloads your equipped Auto Rifle's or Machine Gun's mag.

name: Sunfire Furnace
description: Create more Sunspots. Grenade and melee abilities charge faster with a charged Solar Super.

name: Transfusion Matrix
description: Arc melee kills grant health and melee energy.

name: Dreaded Visage
description: Gain ability energy when you are damaged. While you have a Void Super equipped, final blows grant Devour.

name: Jump Jets
description: Buffs maneuverability and air hipfire in Lift.

name: Mecha Holster
description: Reloads stowed SMGs and allows instant ready.

name: Linear Actuators
description: Faster sprinting and chain melee damage.

name: Helium Spirals
description: Solar grenades burn longer. Melee kills restore them.

name: Vampire's Caress
description: Melee kills restore health for a short duration.

name: Warlord's Sigil
description: Melee kills increase melee damage.

name: Fusion Harness
description: Extra Fusion Grenade. Grenade kills charge Rift.

name: Tome of Dawn
description: Aiming in midair holds you in place while you have a Solar super equipped.

name: Actual Grandeur
description: Nova Bomb kills grant Super energy.

name: Conduction Tines
description: Arc ability or jolt final blows restore Arc abilities.

name: Cerebral Uplink
description: Marks priority targets and buffs ability regen.

name: Abyssal Extractors
description: Void kills increase ability regen.

name: Strange Protractor
description: Buffs sprint. Sprinting reloads current weapon.

name: Alchemical Etchings
description: Rifts increase weapon reload speed. Empowering Rift increases range.

name: Trapper's Ambush
description:
Activate Quickfall to spend your melee charge and dive to the ground, creating a large smoke cloud on impact, which then dissipates. Targets caught in the cloud are weakened, and allies are made invisible.

Your Smoke Bomb makes nearby allies invisible when it attaches to nearby surfaces or targets.

name: Vanishing Step
description: Dodging makes you invisible.

name: Stylish Executioner
description:
Defeating a weakened, suppressed, or volatile target grants Invisibility and Truesight.

After performing a Stylish Execution, your next melee attack while invisible weakens targets.

name: Controlled Demolition
description: Hitting a target with a Void ability or Volatile explosion makes them volatile. Further damage to a volatile target causes them to explode. Grants you and nearby allies health when volatile targets explode near you.

name: Bastion
description:
Cast your Super to grant Overshield to nearby allies. 

Casting your Barricade grants Overshield to yourself and nearby allies and empowers it, enabling it to slowly regenerate the Overshield of allies bunkering behind it and extend their Overshield duration.

name: Offensive Bulwark
description:
While you have an Overshield or are inside Ward of Dawn, your grenade charges significantly faster, you have increased melee range and damage, and melee final blows restore a small portion of your Overshield and extend its duration.

You gain an additional shield throw while in Sentinel Shield.

name: Unbreakable
description:
[Grenade]  : Hold to summon a [Void] Void shield that draws hostile fire and blocks a portion of incoming damage, gradually draining your grenade energy and granting an overshield over time.

Releasing the grenade input or running out of energy releases a frontal blast from your shield that deals increased damage based on how much damage was blocked.

Combatants that come in contact with your shield are temporarily disoriented.

name: Chaos Accelerant
description:
[Grenade]  : Overcharge your grenade, making it deadlier and more effective.

Vortex Grenade: Increases the size and linger duration of the vortex.

Axion Bolt: Creates an additional seeker.

Scatter Grenade: Submunitions track to nearby targets.

Magnetic Grenade: Releases a short-range Void blast. Cooldown is reduced.

name: Feed the Void
description:
Defeat a target with a Void ability to activate Devour.

Your Devour effects are improved, restoring additional health and grenade energy.

name: Child of the Old Gods
description:
Cast your rift to create a Void Soul. When you damage a target with a weapon, your Void Soul flies to them and drains them, doing damage and weakening them.

When a target is being drained, you are granted grenade and melee energy (if running healing rift) or health (if running empowering rift).

Defeating a target who is being drained by your Void Soul grants class ability energy.

name: Echo of Expulsion
description: Void ability final blows cause targets to explode.

name: Echo of Exchange

name: Echo of Reprisal

name: Echo of Undermining

name: Echo of Persistence

name: Echo of Leeching

name: Echo of Domineering

After suppressing a target, you gain greatly increased mobility for a short duration, and your equipped weapon is reloaded from reserves.

Defeating suppressed targets creates a Void Breach.

name: Echo of Dilation

name: Echo of Instability

name: Echo of Harvest

name: Echo of Obscurity

name: Ember of Tempering

Solar weapon final blows grant you and your allies increased recovery for a short duration. Stacks 3 times.

While Ember of Tempering is active, your weapons have increased airborne effectiveness, and your Solar weapon final blows create a Firesprite.

name: Ember of Blistering
description: Defeating targets with Solar ignitions grants grenade energy.

name: Ember of Solace
description: Radiant and restoration effects applied to you have increased duration.

name: Ember of Eruption

name: Ember of Ashes
description: You apply more scorch stacks to targets.

name: Ember of Wonder

name: Ember of Searing
description: Defeating scorched targets grants melee energy and creates a Firesprite.

name: Knock 'Em Down
description:
Your Solar Supers are enhanced. Deadshot Golden Gun has damage resistance, Marksman Golden Gun has increased duration, and Blade Barrage launches more projectiles.

While radiant, final blows with your equipped Throwing Knife fully refund your melee energy.

name: On Your Mark
description:
Precision final blows grant you and nearby allies increased weapon handling and reload speed for a short duration. Stacks 3 times.

Activating your class ability immediately grants maximum stacks of On Your Mark.

name: Gunpowder Gamble
description:
Defeat targets with Solar abilities, Solar debuffs, or Solar weapons to charge up an improvised Solar explosive.

[Grenade]  : Throw a Solar explosive that can be shot in mid-air to cause an ignition.

name: Roaring Flames
description: Final blows with [Solar] Solar abilities or ignitions increase the damage of your Solar abilities. Stacks 3 times.

name: Sol Invictus
description:
Solar ability final blows, Hammer of Sol impacts, and defeating scorched targets creates Sunspots. Your abilities regenerate faster, and your Super drains more slowly while standing in a Sunspot.

Sunspots apply scorch and deal damage to targets inside. Entering a Sunspot applies restoration.

name: Consecration
description:
While sliding, activate your charged melee ability to launch a wave of [Solar] Solar energy forward, damaging and scorching targets in front of you as you leap into the air.

While airborne, activate your charged melee again to slam to the ground and create a second larger wave of damaging [Solar] Solar energy. If the wave hits a scorched target, they ignite.

name: Icarus Dash
description:
[Air Dodge]  : Dodge quickly while airborne.

While Heat Rises is active, you have an additional dodge.

While airborne, rapidly defeating targets with your Super or weapons cures you.

name: Heat Rises
description:
You can fire weapons, melee, and throw grenades while gliding.

[Grenade]  : Hold to consume your grenade, gaining Heat Rises and releasing a burst of healing energy that cures nearby allies. The strength of the burst is increased when a Healing Grenade is consumed.

Final blows while airborne increase the duration of Heat Rises and grant melee energy.

name: Touch of Flame
description:
Your Healing, Solar, Firebolt, and Fusion Grenades have enhanced functionality.

Healing Grenade: Improves the strength of cure and restoration effects applied. Consuming a Healing Grenade with Heat Rises also applies restoration to nearby allies.

Solar Grenade: Increases linger duration. Periodically emits blobs of lava around its perimeter.

Firebolt Grenade: Increases target search radius and maximum target count.

Fusion Grenade: Explodes twice.

name: Hellion
description: Activate your class ability to summon a [Solar] Solar mortar that lobs flaming projectiles at distant targets. Targets damaged by the mortar are scorched.

name: Spark of Amplitude

name: Spark of Feedback

name: Spark of Volts

name: Spark of Brilliance

name: Flow State
description:
Defeating a jolted target makes you amplified.

While you are amplified, your dodge recharges more quickly, you are more resilient while dodging, and your reload speed is greatly increased.

name: Tempest Strike
description: While sliding, activate your charged melee ability to unleash a devastating uppercut attack that travels along the ground in front of you, damaging and jolting targets it hits.

name: Lethal Current
description:
After dodging, your next melee attack has increased lunge range, jolts the target, and creates a damaging aftershock.

Damaging any jolted target with melee attacks also blinds them.

name: Ascension
description: [Air Move]  While airborne, consume your class ability energy to summon your Arc Staff, propelling yourself upward and creating a burst of energy around you that amplifies allies and jolts targets.

name: Touch of Thunder
description:
Your Flashbang, Pulse, Lightning, and Storm Grenades have enhanced functionality.

Flashbang Grenade: Emits an additional blinding flash on bounce.

Pulse Grenade: Creates Ionic Traces periodically as it damages targets and increases in damage over time.

Lightning Grenade: Grants an additional grenade charge, and jolts targets hit by the initial blast.

Storm Grenade: After detonating, creates a roaming thundercloud that tracks nearby targets and fires bolts of lightning at foes beneath it.

name: Juggernaut
description:
With full class ability energy and after sprinting for a short time, you gain a frontal shield that blocks incoming damage. When the frontal shield breaks, your class ability energy is depleted.

While amplified, the shield blocks significantly more damage before breaking.

name: Knockout
description:
Critically wounding a target or breaking their shield infuses your melee attacks with Arc energy and increases your melee range and damage for a short time.

Defeating targets with melee attacks makes you amplified and restores a portion of your health. Defeating more powerful combatants increases the amount of health restored.

name: Arc Soul
description:
Cast your Rift to create an Arc Soul that fires at targets in front of you. Allies can pass through your Rift to get an Arc Soul. Your Rift charges faster when allies are near.

While amplified, your Arc Souls are supercharged and gain increased fire rate.

name: Lightning Surge
description: While sliding, activate your charged melee ability to blink forward, calling down lightning strikes that jolt targets as you rematerialize.

name: Electrostatic Mind
description:
Defeating targets with Arc abilities or defeating jolted or blinded targets creates an Ionic Trace.

Collecting an Ionic Trace makes you amplified.

name: Search Party

name: Hot Swap

Swords gain increased charge speed, guard resistance, and guard endurance instead.

name: Runneth Over

name: Runneth Over

name: Thread of Fury

name: Thread of Finality

name: Thread of Transmutation

name: Thread of Propagation
description: Powered melee final blows grant your [Strand] Strand weapons Unraveling Rounds.

name: Thread of Evolution
description: Threadlings travel farther and deal additional damage.

name: Thread of Isolation

name: Thread of Binding
description: Super final blows emit a suspending burst from the target.

name: Thread of Generation
description: Dealing damage generates grenade energy.

name: Thread of Continuity
description: Suspend, unravel, and sever effects applied to targets have increased duration.

name: Echo of Vigilance
description: Defeating a target while your shields are depleted grants you a temporary Void overshield.

name: Echo of Cessation
description:
Finisher final blows create a burst of Void damage that causes nearby combatants to become volatile.

Defeating volatile targets creates a Void Breach.

name: Spark of Haste
description: You have greatly increased resilience, recovery, and mobility while sprinting.

name: Spark of Instinct
description: While critically wounded, taking damage emits a burst of damaging Arc energy that jolts targets.

name: Ember of Mercy
description:
When you revive an ally, you and other nearby allies gain restoration.

Picking up a Firesprite grants restoration.

name: Ember of Resolve
description: Solar grenade final blows cure you.

name: Widow's Silk
description:
You have an additional grenade charge.

Your Grappling Hook creates a Grapple Tangle at the grapple point.

name: Ensnaring Slam
description: Activate your air move to consume your class ability energy and dive to the ground, suspending all nearby targets on impact. Using this ability extends class ability cooldown time.

name: Threaded Specter
description:
Activating your class ability leaves behind a decoy woven from [Strand] Strand matter that draws the attention of nearby combatants.

After taking significant damage or when combatants approach, the decoy detonates, dealing damage and releasing Threadlings that seek out and attack nearby foes.

name: Whirling Maelstrom
description: Whirling Maelstrom

name: Into the Fray
description: Into the Fray

name: Drengr's Lash
description: Activate your Barricade ability to create a ripple in reality that travels forward along the ground, suspending and damaging the targets it hits.

name: Flechette Storm
description:
While sliding, activate your charged melee ability to leap into the air, knocking nearby targets away and dealing damage.

While airborne, activate your charged melee again to launch a cluster of damaging, Unraveling projectiles. Repeatedly activating melee will chain additional throws.

name: Banner of War
description:
Defeat a target with a melee attack, finisher, or Sword to raise a Banner of War that pulses with energy, periodically healing nearby allies and increasing melee and Sword damage. 

Targets defeated by you and nearby allies charge the banner, increasing the speed of its pulses.

name: Weaver's Call
description:
Activate your class ability to weave three Threadlings and deploy any Threadlings you have perched.

Targets defeated by [Strand] Strand damage have a chance to generate a perched Threadling.

name: Mindspun Invocation
description:
Your grapple, Shackle Grenade, and Threadling Grenade have enhanced functionality.

Your grapple melee spawns three Threadling eggs.

[Grenade]  : Hold to consume your Shackle Grenade and activate Weaver's Trance. Final blows while Weaver's Trance is active create a suspending detonation.

[Grenade]  : Hold to consume your Threadling Grenade and immediately generate five perched Threadlings.

name: The Wanderer
description:
Tangles you throw attach to targets and detonate into a suspending burst. Destroying a Tangle creates a suspending burst after a short delay.

Threadling final blows create a Tangle.

name: Weavewalk
description:
[Air Dodge]  : Dodge while airborne to consume your melee energy and enter the weave, gaining damage resistance from combatants and players. Reactivate your air dodge or cast your Rift to exit the weave.

While in the weave, your melee energy is drained and you generate perched Threadlings over time.

name: Marksman's Dodge
description: Marksman's Dodge

name: Gambler's Dodge
description: Gambler's Dodge

name: Focused Darkness
description: When you have Flux of Darkness, gain increased ability damage and mobility.

name: Focused Light
description: When you have Field of Light, gain increased weapon damage and resilience.

name: Cabal Extinguisher
description: When an ally gains Flux of Darkness or Field of Light, deal increased weapon damage to Cabal combatants for a short time.

name: Release Recover
description: When you lose Flux of Darkness or Field of Light, begin recovering health.

name: Precise Jolts
description: Rapid precision hits with Arc weapons jolt the target. Must have an Arc subclass equipped.

name: Radiant Heat
description: Powerful combatant final blows with Solar weapons grants Radiant. Must have a Solar subclass equipped.

name: Chill Out
description: Defeating a combatant with a Stasis weapon spawns a Stasis crystal. Must have a Stasis subclass equipped.

name: Volatile Volleys
description: Defeating powerful combatants with a Void weapon gives your Void weapons Volatile Rounds. Must have a Void subclass equipped.

name: Tangled Up
description: Defeating a combatant with a Strand weapon spawns a Tangle. Must have a Strand subclass equipped.

name: Acrobat's Focus
description: Gain Woven Mail when grappling and flinch resistance while Woven Mail is active.

name: Puppeteer's Control
description: Improved Drengr's Lash. Gain Woven Mail when suspending targets.

name: Swarmers
description: Threadlings spawn from Tangles and unravel targets.

description: Queen's Favor

name: Immovable Refit

name: Robber Refit

name: Feedback Refit

name: Spindle
description: Threadling damage increases this weapon's damage.

name: Paracausal Imbuement
description: Final blows with this weapon grant Super energy. This weapon gains bonus damage once your Super expires.

name: Eyes Up, Guardian
description: Collecting Orbs of Power strengthens this weapon's next several ricochet shots, providing more damage and more bounces between targets.

name: Inverse Relationship
description:
When you deal damage with this weapon, it gains increased handling, takes reduced flinch, and movement speed is increased for a short time.

When you are at reduced health, this weapon deals additional damage.

name: Transcendent Duelist
description:
This weapon collects less ammo. Final blows with this weapon accelerate Light and Darkness mastery.
Deals increased damage while Transcendent; defeating targets lengthens Transcendence.

name: Vortex Frame
description:
[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy spin attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

name: Caster Frame
description:
[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy projectile attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

name: Wave Sword Frame
description:
Heavy attack deploys a shockwave uppercut and launches the user into the air.

An immediate follow up swing after the uppercut deploys a homing strike that aggressively seeks a target.

name: Lightweight Frame
description:
Fast movement.
[Heavy Attack]  : Dash attack.

name: Aggressive Frame
description:
Powerful, heavy swings.
[Heavy Attack]  : Slam.

name: Air Trigger
description: Increased ammo reserves. When airborne, accuracy and reload speed are increased but target acquisition is decreased.

name: Air Trigger
description: Greatly increased ammo reserves. When airborne, accuracy and reload speed are further increased but target acquisition is decreased.

name: To the Pain
description:
While this weapon is equipped, taking damage increases handling and aim assist until the weapon is stowed.

Taking more damage increases the effect.

name: To the Pain
description:
While this weapon is equipped, taking damage greatly increases handling and aim assist until the weapon is stowed.

Taking more damage increases the effect.

name: Reverberation
description: Final blows with this weapon increase the size of its detonations for a short duration.

name: Reverberation
description: Final blows with this weapon increase the size of its detonations for an improved duration.

name: Chaos Reshaped
description: This weapon gains bonus damage while in combat for an extended time. Remaining in combat for even longer rewards a larger damage bonus and periodically heals the wielder.

name: Chaos Reshaped
description: This weapon gains bonus damage while in combat for an extended time, activating faster. Remaining in combat for a slightly reduced duration rewards a larger damage bonus and periodically heals the wielder.

name: Strategist
description: Final blows with this weapon generate class ability energy. Activating your class ability briefly improves this weapon's stability.

name: Strategist
description: Final blows with this weapon generate improved class ability energy. Activating your class ability briefly improves this weapon's stability.

description: Rapidly healing allies grants this weapon a period of increased damage.

name: Circle of Life
description: Rapidly healing allies grants this weapon an improved period of increased damage.

name: Threat Remover
description: Dealing damage with nearly all pellets in a spread increases reload speed, handling, and stability.

name: Collective Purpose
description: Gain bonus range and handling when near allies. Bows receive faster draw time and Swords receive faster charge rate. The effect scales with the number of nearby allies.

name: Dealer's Choice
description: Final blows with this weapon grant a small amount of Super energy. Equipping multiple weapons from the Pale Heart increases this effect.

name: Radiolaria Transposer

name: Cast No Shadows
description: Dealing melee damage increases this weapon's handling and loads a small amount of ammo from reserves.

name: Facet of Grace
description: Defeating targets with Kinetic weapons grants you bonus Transcendence energy. Defeating targets with your Super grants you and nearby allies bonus Transcendence energy.

name: Facet of Sacrifice
description: While you have an Arc, Solar, or Void buff, ability final blows grant bonus Darkness Transcendence energy.

name: Facet of Devotion
description: Defeating targets afflicted with [Stasis] Stasis or [Strand] Strand debuffs grants bonus Light Transcendence energy.

name: Facet of Generosity
description: Defeating targets while transcendent creates Orbs of Power for your allies.

name: Facet of Justice
description: While transcendent, your ability final blows explode.

name: Facet of Honor
description: Collecting an elemental pickup or destroying a Tangle grants Transcendence energy of the same type.

name: Facet of Hope
description: While you have an elemental buff, your class ability regenerates more quickly.

name: Facet of Courage
description: Your [Arc] Arc, [Solar] Solar, and [Void] Void abilities deal increased damage to targets afflicted with Darkness debuffs.

name: Facet of Balance
description: Rapidly defeating targets with Light damage grants melee energy. Rapidly defeating targets with Darkness damage grants grenade energy.

name: Facet of Bravery
description: Defeating targets with grenade final blows grants Volatile Rounds to your [Void] Void weapons. Defeating targets with powered melee final blows grants Unraveling Rounds to your [Strand] Strand weapons.

name: Facet of Awakening
description: Rapidly defeating targets with Light or Darkness damage or Super final blows generates an elemental pickup of the matching damage type.

name: Facet of Command
description:
Freezing or suppressing a target reloads your equipped weapons and increases weapon stability, aim assist, and airborne effectiveness.

Defeating frozen or suppressed targets creates a Stasis Shard or Void Breach.

name: Facet of Dawn
description: Powered melee hits against targets makes you radiant. Powered melee final blows make you and nearby allies radiant.

name: Facet of Protection
description: While surrounded by combatants, you are more resistant to incoming damage. While transcendent, the effect is increased.

name: Facet of Blessing
description: Melee final blows start health regeneration. While transcendent, melee final blows start health regeneration for you and nearby allies.

name: Facet of Purpose
description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants either Amplified, Restoration, Frost Armor, Woven Mail, or Overshield based on the damage type of your equipped Super.

name: Facet of Mending
description: Grenade final blows cure you. Transcendence grenade final blows increase the strength of the effect.

name: Facet of Defiance
description: Finishers create a detonation that either jolts, scorches, slows, severs, or makes targets volatile based on the damage type of your equipped Super.

name: Facet of Solitude
description: Landing rapid precision hits emits a severing blast from the target. While transcendent, the severing blast is bigger.

name: Facet of Ruin
description: Increases the size and damage of the burst when you shatter a Stasis crystal or frozen target, and increases the area of effect of Solar ignitions.

name: Facet of Dominance
description: Your Void grenades weaken targets, and your Arc grenades jolt targets.

name: Whisper of Reversal
description: While you have Frost Armor, melee damage slows your target.

name: Whisper of Chill
description: [Stasis] Stasis weapon final blows have a chance to create a Stasis Shard.

name: Ascension
description: [Air Move]  While airborne, consume your class ability energy to summon your Arc Staff, propelling yourself upward and creating a burst of energy around you that amplifies allies and jolts targets.

name: Stylish Executioner
description:
Defeating a target affected by any elemental debuff grants invisibility and Truesight.

After performing a Stylish Execution, your next melee attack while invisible weakens targets.

name: Gunpowder Gamble
description:
Defeat targets with abilities, elemental debuff damage, or [Solar] Solar weapons to charge up an improvised [Solar] Solar explosive.

[Grenade]  : Throw a [Solar] Solar explosive that can be shot in mid-air to cause an ignition.

name: Winter's Shroud
description:
Dodging slows nearby targets.

Slowing targets briefly increases your class ability regeneration.

name: Threaded Specter
description:
Activating your class ability leaves behind a decoy woven from [Strand] Strand matter that draws the attention of nearby combatants.

After taking significant damage or when combatants approach, the decoy detonates, dealing damage and releasing Threadlings that seek out and attack nearby foes.

name: Unbreakable
description:
[Grenade]  : Hold to summon a [Void] Void shield that draws hostile fire and blocks a portion of incoming damage, gradually draining your grenade energy and granting an overshield over time.

Releasing the grenade input or running out of energy releases a frontal blast from your shield that deals increased damage based on how much damage was blocked.

Combatants that come in contact with your shield are temporarily disoriented.

name: Consecration
description:
While sliding, activate your charged melee ability to launch a wave of [Solar] Solar energy forward, damaging and scorching targets in front of you as you leap into the air.

While airborne, activate your charged melee again to slam to the ground and create a second larger wave of damaging [Solar] Solar energy. If the wave hits a scorched target, they ignite.

name: Knockout
description:
Critically wounding a target or breaking their shield infuses your melee attacks with Arc energy and increases your melee range and damage for a short time.

Defeating targets with melee attacks makes you amplified and restores a portion of your health. Defeating more powerful combatants increases the amount of health restored.

name: Diamond Lance
description:
Shatter or defeat targets with abilities or [Stasis] Stasis weapons to create a Stasis lance.

[Shoot]  : Throw the lance to freeze targets on impact.

[Melee]  : Slam the lance to the ground to freeze targets in a small area.

name: Drengr's Lash
description: Activate your Barricade ability to create a ripple in reality that travels forward along the ground, suspending and damaging the targets it hits.

name: Hellion
description: Activate your class ability to summon a [Solar] Solar mortar that lobs flaming projectiles at distant targets. Targets damaged by the mortar are scorched.

name: Feed the Void
description:
Defeat a target with any ability to activate Devour.

Your Devour effects are improved, restoring additional health and grenade energy.

name: Lightning Surge
description: While sliding, activate your charged melee ability to blink forward, calling down lightning strikes that jolt targets as you rematerialize.

name: Bleak Watcher
description: [Grenade]  : Hold to convert your grenade into a [Stasis] Stasis turret that fires slowing projectiles at nearby targets.

name: Weaver's Call
description:
Activate your class ability to weave three Threadlings and deploy any Threadlings you have perched.

Targets defeated by [Strand] Strand damage have a chance to generate a perched Threadling.

description: Adds a Taken appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Umbral Harbinger
description: Adds a cauldron of bats appearance to your transmat effects.

name: No Backpack

name: Ice Breaker
description: Defeating a target with this weapon causes them to explode. Precision final blows or shattering a frozen target instead triggers an ignition.

name: Heart Piercer
description: Rounds from this weapon shatter into submunitions on impact. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

name: Vestigial Alchemy
description:
This weapon gains energy when you pick up Vestiges and allows you to create ammo at the projectile impact point for you and your allies. Special ammo mode unlocks at 50% energy, while Heavy ammo mode unlocks at 100% energy. 

To transform Vestiges into Special ammo, [Alternate Weapon Action]  and cycle through all available firing modes. 

To transform Vestiges into Heavy ammo, [Alternate Weapon Action]  and cycle firing modes a second time.

name: Null Factor
description: Withering Blade creates Stasis crystals.

name: Bleak Domain
description: Bleak Watcher turrets are enhanced and grant icicle projectiles to weapons.

name: Blastwave Striders
description: Blast your boots to spray your targets with shrapnel.

name: Eido's Apprentice
description: Eido's Apprentice

description: Gain additional Glimmer when looting engrams.

name: Strength in Numbers
description: Increases chance of receiving an engram when completing playlist activities with a clan member.

name: Scavenger: Cabal
description: Improves rewards from eliminating Cabal enemies.

name: Public Service

name: Venture Capital

name: The Extra Mile

name: Vex Slayer

name: Explore the Infinite

name: Crucible Cash

name: Hive Slayer

name: Vanguard Valiant

name: Union of Strength

name: Refined Sights

name: Scorn Slayer

name: Weapon Ritualist

name: Support Frame
description:
Flexible and agile frame capable of healing allies and hurting foes. Harming targets builds a restorative charge.

Hip firing at allies while this weapon is charged heals them, with rapid healing increasing weapon damage and bestowing restoration to your allies.

name: Dark Ether Reaper
description:
Final blows with this weapon periodically spawn Dark Ether charges.

Charges can be detonated early with weapons fire or by coming into contact with them. Doing so refills this weapon from reserves.

name: Photoinhibition
description: This weapon deals bonus damage to combatant shields and targets with overshields. Breaking a combatant's shield disorients them; breaking an energy-matched shield also disorients nearby combatants.

name: Splicer Surge
description: Reloading this weapon after dealing damage grants the weapon a stacking reload speed and handling bonus until stowed.

name: Jolting Feedback
description:
Dealing repeated damage with this weapon inflicts Jolt. 

While amplified, Jolt is applied faster.

name: Jolting Feedback
description:
Dealing repeated damage with this weapon inflicts Jolt at an increased rate. 

While amplified, Jolt is applied faster.

name: Withering Gaze
description: Aiming this weapon for a short period of time without firing grants the ability to weaken the next target. Timer resets after firing or when you stop aiming down sights.

name: Withering Gaze
description: Aiming this weapon for a shorter period of time without firing grants the ability to weaken the next target. Timer resets after firing or when you stop aiming down sights.

name: Rimestealer
description: Destroying a Stasis crystal or defeating a frozen target with this weapon grants you Frost Armor.

name: Rimestealer
description: Destroying a Stasis crystal or defeating a frozen target with this weapon grants you an improved amount of Frost Armor.

name: Lone Wolf
description: Slightly improves aim assist, aim down sights speed, and airborne effectiveness. Increases these effects when there are no nearby allies.

name: Lone Wolf

name: Closing Time
description: Improves range, accuracy, and handling as the magazine gets lower.

name: Closing Time
description: Further improves range, accuracy, and handling as the magazine gets lower.

name: Envious Arsenal
description: Dealing damage with both other weapons before readying this weapon refills it from reserves.

name: Envious Arsenal
description: Dealing damage with both other weapons before readying this weapon refills it from reserves. Increases ammo reserves.

name: Tactical

name: Aerodynamics

name: Tension

name: Edge

name: Anti-Flinch

name: Synergy

name: Stunloader
